properties.body:
NORTH SEA.
SHETLAND ISLANDS.
DNC 20.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V AMAZON WARRIOR TOWING 8 3100 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   59-57.60N 000-51.60E, 59-38.90N 001-51.50E,
   59-11.20N 001-17.70E, 59-29.60N 000-18.30E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1235/22.
